name: unicycler
usage:
unicycler [-h] [--help_all] [--version] [-1 SHORT1] [-2 SHORT2]
          [-s UNPAIRED] [-l LONG] -o OUT [--verbosity VERBOSITY]
          [--min_fasta_length MIN_FASTA_LENGTH] [--keep KEEP]
          [-t THREADS] [--mode {conservative,normal,bold}]
          [--min_bridge_qual MIN_BRIDGE_QUAL]
          [--linear_seqs LINEAR_SEQS]
          [--min_anchor_seg_len MIN_ANCHOR_SEG_LEN]
          [--spades_path SPADES_PATH] [--min_kmer_frac MIN_KMER_FRAC]
          [--max_kmer_frac MAX_KMER_FRAC] [--kmers KMERS]
          [--kmer_count KMER_COUNT] [--depth_filter DEPTH_FILTER]
          [--largest_component] [--spades_options SPADES_OPTIONS]
          [--no_miniasm] [--racon_path RACON_PATH]
          [--existing_long_read_assembly EXISTING_LONG_READ_ASSEMBLY]
          [--no_simple_bridges] [--no_long_read_alignment]
          [--contamination CONTAMINATION] [--scores SCORES]
          [--low_score LOW_SCORE]
          [--min_component_size MIN_COMPONENT_SIZE]
          [--min_dead_end_size MIN_DEAD_END_SIZE] [--no_rotate]
          [--start_genes START_GENES] [--start_gene_id START_GENE_ID]
          [--start_gene_cov START_GENE_COV]
          [--makeblastdb_path MAKEBLASTDB_PATH]
          [--tblastn_path TBLASTN_PATH]

options.description: Show this help message and exit
Show a help message with all program options
Show Unicycler's version number
FASTQ file of first short reads in each pair
FASTQ file of second short reads in each pair
FASTQ file of unpaired short reads
FASTQ or FASTA file of long reads
Output directory (required),--verbosity VERBOSITY   Level of stdout and log file information (default: 1)   0 = no stdout, 1 = basic progress indicators, 2 = extra info, 3 = debugging info

Level of file retention (default: 1)   0 = only keep final files: assembly (FASTA, GFA and log), 1 = also save graphs at main checkpoints, 2 = also keep SAM (enables fast rerun in different mode), 3 = keep all temp files and save all graphs (for debugging)
Exclude contigs from the FASTA file which are shorter than this length (default: 100)
Number of threads used (default: 8)
Bridging mode (default: normal)
Do not apply bridges with a quality below this value
The expected number of linear (i.e. non-circular) sequences in the underlying sequence (default: 0)
If set, Unicycler will not use segments shorter than this as scaffolding anchors (default: automatic threshold)
Path to the SPAdes executable (default: spades.py)
Lowest k-mer size for SPAdes assembly, expressed as a fraction of the read length (default: 0.2)
Highest k-mer size for SPAdes assembly, expressed as a fraction of the read length (default: 0.95)
Exact k-mers to use for SPAdes assembly, commaseparated (example: 21,51,71, default: automatic)
Number of k-mer steps to use in SPAdes assembly (default: 8)
Filter out contigs lower than this fraction of the chromosomal depth, if doing so does not result in graph dead ends (default: 0.25)
Only keep the largest connected component of the assembly graph (default: keep all connected components)
Additional options to be given to SPAdes (example: " --phred-offset 33", default: no additional options)
Skip miniasm+Racon bridging (default: use miniasm and Racon to produce long-read bridges)
Path to the Racon executable (default: racon)

A pre-prepared long-read assembly for the sample in GFA or FASTA format. If this option is used, Unicycler will skip the miniasm/Racon steps and instead use the given assembly (default: perform long-read assembly using miniasm/Racon)
Skip simple long-read bridging (default: use simple long-read bridging)
Skip long-read-alignment-based bridging (default: use long-read alignments to produce bridges)
FASTA file of known contamination in long reads
Comma-delimited string of alignment scores: match, mismatch, gap open, gap extend (default: 3,-6,-5,-2)
Score threshold - alignments below this are considered poor (default: set threshold automatically)
Graph components smaller than this size (bp) will be removed from the final graph (default: 1000)
Graph dead ends smaller than this size (bp) will be removed from the final graph (default: 1000)
Do not rotate completed replicons to start at a standard gene (default: completed replicons are rotated)
FASTA file of genes for start point of rotated replicons (default: start_genes.fasta)
The minimum required BLAST percent identity for a start gene search (default: 90.0)
The minimum required BLAST percent coverage for a start gene search (default: 95.0)
Path to the makeblastdb executable (default: makeblastdb)
Path to the tblastn executable (default: tblastn)
